title: How does one create a new special interest group?
content:
How does one create a new special interest group?

 [‹ Font Haiku](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907013408/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46639 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help! pls help with this type face! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907013408/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46606 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Christopher Dean

comments.content: You must submit your intentions to a moderator, such as myself. It is then presented to all moderators and powers that be for discussion.

Would it be helpful to post a “feeler” thread first to guage  
the degree of interest?

j a m e s

That’s a good idea too. But not necessary. We fast-tracked the approval of a forum from the varying topics being discussed about Arabic Typography & Type Design without needing any kind of test.

[http://typophile.com/forum/366](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907013408/http:/typophile.com/forum/366 "http://typophile.com/forum/366")

The interest in Arabic was already there so that one was to some extent a forgone conclusion.

Christopher—do you have a specific topic or area of interest in mind, and is it somehting on which _some_ discussion threads already exist?

j a m e s

Not going to get any response from you on this one am I Tiffany? Didn’t think so.

j a m e s

Hrm. I thought you were talking to Christopher.

Yes. That is true. There has been an increasing interest in Arabic type design and typography. There would be no harm in starting a thread to see if there is interest.

I will synthesize my ideas and make a formal request hen I am ready.

Thank you.

Sorry Tiffany, my goof.  
_There would be no harm in starting a thread to see if there is interest._

Cool, we’ll leave that to Christopher then.
